Changelog
=========

0.3 (2011-07-25)
----------------

- Remove git submodule.

0.2 (2011-07-24)
----------------

- Calculate width of selectbox based on children [jaroel]

- Add support for selectboxes with dotted ID's.
  https://github.com/harvesthq/chosen/issues/54 [jaroel]


0.1 (2011-07-23)
----------------

- Initial release [jaroel]
